movies.name: 12 Monkeys
movies.plot: Inspired by the 1962 French short La Jet√©e, a prisoner (Bruce Willis) is sent back in time to learn more about the virus that wiped out nearly all of humanity. Terry Gilliam directs.

movies.name: 12 Years A Slave
movies.plot: Duped into slavery on the account of a job, Steve McQueen's adaptation of a free New York black man's (Chiwetel Ejiofor) 19th-century memoir is an incredible true story, and an important watch.

movies.name: Shawshank Redemption
movies.plot: Andy Dufresne, a successful banker, is arrested for the murders of his wife and her lover, and is sentenced to life imprisonment at the Shawshank prison. He becomes the most unconventional prisoner.

movies.name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
movies.plot: In Stanley Kubrick's highly-influential sci-fi film, humanity charts a course for Jupiter with the sentient computer HAL 9000, to understand the discovery of a black monolith affecting human evolution. It's less plot, and more a visual and aural experience.

movies.name: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham...
movies.plot: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham..,is an Indian Hindi-language drama film written and directed by Karan Johar and produced by Yash Johar. The film stars Amitabh Bachchan with Rani Mukerji appearing in an extended special appearance

movies.name: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
movies.plot: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani (transl. This youth is crazy) is a 2013 Indian romantic drama film, directed by Ayan Mukerji, written by Mukerji and Hussain Dalal, and produced by Karan Johar.[3][4] It stars Ranbir Kapoor and Deepika Padukone in roles.[5] This is their second film together after 2008's Bachna Ae Haseeno. Kalki Koechlin and Aditya Roy Kapur play supporting roles.[6] Madhuri Dixit appears in an item number with Ranbir Kapoor.
